thread.title: Linda Zanni
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Linda Zanni

author: Linda Zanni
title: Linda Zanni
text: So far, the employees I spoke with before renting were very friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. My experience with the representative at the front deskin was very professional, friendly and knowledgeable. Explained everything to me than walked me through every step of the way. Walked me right up to my storage unit and answered any questions I had without hesitation. I would highly recommend Public Storage to anyone in need of renting storage units.
